title: The Lion Hunt
artistDisplayName: Schelte Adamsz. Bolswert (Dutch, active in Flanders, c. 1586–1659)
medium: Engraving in black on cream laid paper, tipped onto cream laid paper
dimensions: Image: 40.9 × 58.6 cm (16 1/8 × 23 1/8 in.); Primary support, trimmed within platemark: 42.5 × 59 cm (16 3/4 × 23 1/4 in.); Secondary support: 49.6 × 68 cm (19 9/16 × 26 13/16 in.)
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. The Amanda S. Johnson and Marion J. Livingston Fund
